newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: S.AFRICA'S MACSTEEL SELLS AUSTRALIAN DISTRIBUTOR.
newsitem.headline: S.AFRICA'S MACSTEEL SELLS AUSTRALIAN DISTRIBUTOR.

text.p: Hardware, engineering and towage group Howard Smith Ltd said on Thursday it planned to buy Horans Steel from unlisted Macsteel of South Africa for an undisclosed sum.

Howard Smith deputy managing director Ian Tsicalas said in a statement Horans Steel holds BHP steel distribution franchises in New South Wales for structural, slab and plate, rod and bar and sheet and coil steel products.
Tsicalas said the acquisition was a strategic opportunity to expand the range of products supplied by Howard Smith's distribution division. Horans Steel has annual sales in excess of A$45 million.
Horans Steel would become the centre point of a national network of steel service and distribution centres, strengthening Howard Smith's distribution network, Tsicalas said.
He said Horans was also a distributor of steel products for Palmer Tube Mills, Welded Tube Mills and Smorgon Steel.
